quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The more we value things, the less we value ourselves.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
author: Stephanie Klein

quote: That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but of playing a poor hand well.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Some people die at 25 and aren’t buried until 75.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: You will see in the world what you carry in your heart.
author: Creig Crippen

quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Normality is a paved road; it’s comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Your past mistakes are meant to guide you, not define you.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Death is not the greatest loss of life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while we live.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Unable are the loved to die for love is immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Dr. Robert Schuller

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Some people walk in the rain, others just get wet.
author: Roger Miller

quote: Nature never hurries, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Keep your face towards the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
author: Lou Holtz
